thread.title: NFL Week 6 injuries: Watkins hurt again
thread.title_full: NFL Week 6 injuries: Watkins hurt again

author: USA TODAY Sports, USA TODAY
title: NFL Week 6 injuries: Watkins hurt again
text:
NFL Week 6 injuries: Watkins hurt again USA Today Sports 5 hrs ago by USA TODAY Sports, USA TODAY © Bill Wippert, AP Bill Wippert, AP Sammy Watkins finally received the treatment he desired from the Buffalo Bills' offense, but the wide receiver suffered a sprained ankle Sunday.
AdChoices Watkins emerged from the locker room on crutches after sustaining an injury in the second quarter. He caught a 22-yard touchdown pass from EJ Manuel but in the second quarter but remained down on the field after the play. He had four catches for 48 yards before leaving the game.
Earlier in the week, Watkins had complained about not being targeted enough in the Bills' passing game.
Here are the other notable injuries from Sunday in the NFL:
— Pittsburgh Steelers quarterback Michael Vick exited the game against the Arizona Cardinals with what officials called a hamstring injury.
— Steelers left tackle Kelvin Beachum suffered a torn ACL, coach Mike Tomlin said after Sunday's game.
— Denver Broncos outside linebacker Shane Ray was carted off with a knee injury against the Cleveland Browns.
— Cardinals tight end Daniel Fells suffered a shoulder injury and was ruled out.
